website_summaries.verdict: A cute line of swimsuits that are well-made and feature bright colors.
pros: 7 different designs available in sizes 0 to 6 months up to 5T to 6T
Made of quality fabric and features bright colors
Zipper front makes it easy to take on and off and dries quickly
cons: No bottom snaps for diaper changes and sizes run small

customer_reviews.title: Absoulety PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying, "I read reviews good and bad". My search included specific product details in the description so, it took quite a bit time and was well worth it.. After reviewing tons of baby boy swimsuits for my 8.5 month old, this one really exceeded my product expectations. The fit is perfect 6-12 months, nice quality, true to colors (rich & vibrant). I like the idea of no snaps on bottom ( no water access). This swimsuit looks so cute on...he didn't want me to take it off; for sure it will be a hit at the pool or beach. Hopefully, this review will save you a lot of search time.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Too small. Buy a size or two up...
customer_reviews.text: Loose threads all over the seams ... and this thing is tiny! I bought 6/12 for a 4 month old thinking it would be big and last a while for $20.... and it’s tight on him now. More for a 3/6 ...
customer_reviews.author: ernest wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fit was good, wish zipper went all the way down
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great, colors are great, BUT you have to take the entire swimsuit off to be able to change a diaper. NOT FUN. overall its really cute fit and quality as expected.
customer_reviews.author: RWeeks

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this for our baby to go to the ocean. Covers arms & legs.. easy zip up to put on & off
customer_reviews.author: Michell

customer_reviews.title: Quality water suit
customer_reviews.text: The quality is unbelievable on this little water suit it fits my grandson great..with a little room to grow I would buy another one and would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Benson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 7 month old great!! Is perfect the design is great love that it has a zipper in the front as well so no need to be flipping my child to zip up works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit
customer_reviews.text: This suit is great. I bought one for my 4 and 1 year olds for a trip to Hawaii. They both loved it. Washed up well. Reduced our need for sunscreen. And super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great infant swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Best infant boys swimsuit! Dries fast, easy on and off
customer_reviews.author: Melziepie

customer_reviews.title: No snaps at bottom
customer_reviews.text: cute and seemed to be of good quality. Returning because there are no snaps at the crotch for easy diaper changes. Just doesn't seem practical for a baby
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and fabric is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: such a cut suit. My only complaint is the zipper can sometimes by uncomfortable for him to lie on. Would definitely recommend though!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren messner

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Durable and true to size. Great coverage for pool while still being light weight. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: So cute and great material. May run a little small. My baby is 6 mo old and ordered a 12 mo. Fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for keeping the sun off baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love this one piece suit for my chubby baby! Fits very well and keeps the sun off of him.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Ahern

product_meta.title: HUAANIUE Baby Toddler Boy Swimsuit Rash Guard Swimwear One Piece Car 6-12 Month
